snippet.title: Coromon: Rogue Planet - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
We at TRAGsoft are over (and beyond) the moon to announce Coromon: Rogue Planet! This spin-off game returns to Velua shortly after the events of the first game, bringing you more Coromon gameplay, but with a new, roguelite twist!

With procedurally generated levels and paths, we’ve ensured that no two runs will ever be the same. As you explore the depths of Velua, you’ll encounter an ever-changing array of challenges, foes, and treasures, making each adventure uniquely yours.

We’ve been pouring our passion into this game for quite some time, and while it’s still a work in progress, we’re confident that the blend of monster-taming and roguelite gameplay will be something truly unforgettable for both newcomers and veterans!

Don’t forget to wishlist Coromon: Rogue Planet on Steam now, it really helps us! https://store.steampowered.com/app/3195360

Don’t forget to join us over on our Discord for up-to-date news! https://discord.gg/coromon
